metadata.title: CVE-2019-9942 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: A sandbox information disclosure exists in Twig before 1.38.0 and 2.xbefore 2.7.0 because, under some circumstances, it is possible to call the__toString() method on an object even if not allowed by the security policyin place.

criterions.comment: twig: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
